entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Snow and local blowing snow beginning in the evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
